name: Connecticut Lonsdale
additionalNotes:
Doña Inez’s filler tobaccos are a blend of Nicaraguan Cuban-seed Ligero, Dominican San Vicente Olor, and Nicaraguan Piloto Cubano. Available in Indonesian-grown Sumatran, Maduro and Connecticut wrappers. The Connecticut version is new and will be available starting 9/28/07.

(2 fillers)
